title: Weretank

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a New Moon, protect someone, giving them Powerful defense against all attacks.
- During a Full Moon, transform into a tank, dealing a Powerful Astral attack that pierces through protective effects. You have Powerful defense on these nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect immune
- In the bot, this may appear in either Coven or Were color.
- You have access to both factional chats.
- You may win with either faction.
- Both factions may choose to kill you.
- You may choose to perform a false ability to either faction.
- With the Necronomicon, you may use both your New and Full moon abilities on any night and you Rampage.
- **Hunting Moon Enhancement: Auxiliary Fire** — Gain two machine guns as well that each deal an Astral Basic attack. If you are roleblocked, you will attack the roleblocker and destroy their will.
- The Hunting Moon and Necronomicon both spawn even if the full faction doesn’t.
